name: express-stormpath
description: Build simple, secure web applications with Stormpath and Express!

scripts.docs: cd docs && rm -rf _build/html && make html && jsdoc -d ./apidocs/ -P ./package.json -r .
scripts.test: npm run lint && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --check-leaks --report html -- --reporter spec --recursive --growl --no-timeouts
scripts.test-travis: npm run lint && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --check-leaks --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --recursive --no-timeouts

author: Stormpath, Inc.
